attributes.action: work with Premier League and Eufa to make modern football a game for more than top 4
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fans from all over England are sick of the modern game of football.  By the current allocation of resources, prize money, TV deals etc, there same 4 finish in the top 4 and the rest are excluded with little chance.

You will see fromthe names that many are disillutioned about this and you need to set up a review of the modern game to allow debate and for the views of fans to be heard above those of TV companies and some very very rich clubs with a vested interest.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
